{{Infobox dungeon |name = Burned Tower |image = [[File:Burned Tower.png]] |caption = An outside view of Burned Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northwest of Ecruteak City. }} '''Burned Tower''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 88,500 |- | Golbat (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Weezing (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Shuckle (Boss) || 610,000 |} ==Pokémon== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Boss |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || rowspan=4|[[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat
[[File:Weezing.png|40px]] Weezing

Chest Item !!
